title: Oriental chicken farfalle salad
ingredients: ['3 skinless boneless chicken breasts, about 150 g (5½ oz) each', '2 lemon or lime slices', '1 tbsp rice wine (sake or mirin) or dry sherry', '300g (10½ oz) farfalle (pasta bows)', '150g (5½ oz) carrots, cut into matchstick strips', '1 red pepper, seeded and cut into matchstick strips', '2 celery sticks, cut into matchstick strips', '½ cucumber, about 200 g (7 oz), halved, seeded and cut into matchstick strips', 'Dressing', '2 tbsp fish sauce', '1 tsp caster sugar', '1 tbsp rice vinegar, cider vinegar or white wine vinegar', '1 tbsp soy sauce', '1 small fresh red chilli, seeded and finely chopped', '1 large garlic clove, crushed']
